alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Eastern Clay; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 4:21PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Duval County through 500 PM EDT... At 421 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Riverside, or over Jacksonville, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Arlington, Nas Jax, Baymeadows, Ortega, San Marco, Riverside, Bellair-Meadowbrook Terrace and Tallyrand. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Eastern Clay; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval
